entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS AROUND 70
